key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Whether to show notifications when the timer ends.

key.name: enable-keep-awake
key.description: Whether to keep the system awake while the timer is running, if the computer falls asleep the timer won't trigger.

key.name: default-media-is-all
key.description: Whether the default selected media player is 'All' or not.

key.name: selected-timer-end-commands
key.description: A list of commands/features selected by the user to execute when the timer ends.
